name: Lost Castle: Co-op Escape Room
description:
Lost Castle: Co-op Escape Room

Medieval Escape Room with Online Co-op. Escape the jail and solve the mysteries of long forgotten castle.

ESCAPE THE CASTLE WITH FRIENDS

Try it solo or with your friends! Online multiplayer for up to 4 players. Hurry up and get that ship going!

EXPLORE AND INTERACT

Clues can be hidden in the most unexpected places. You never know what the mysteries of the lost castle have prepared for you!

OVERCOME OBSTACLES

"The world is divided into men who have wit and men who have no wit." Which side are you on?

AND BE PREPARED TO GET YOUR HANDS DIRTY

''Letters are signs of things, symbols of words, whose power is so great that without a voice they speak to us the words of the absent; for they introduce words by the eye, not by the ear."

The game is still actively in-development so any feedback is welcome!
